Unnamed: 1: Total number of IUCN Red List species ranges that overlap with Rio Tinto operating assets
Only managed Joint Ventures and operating assets are included  and hereafter referred to as "assets".
Only species listed in the International Union for Conservation of Nature Red List (IUCN Red List, 2022) are included.
As there is geographic bias in where species on the IUCN Red List have been assessed, a direct comparison between assets is not possible.
Data downloaded under licence from the Integrated Biodiversity Assessment Tool (IBAT).
Assets may have more accurate data on Red List species from studies and monitoring completed at the asset.
Borates and lithium sites Coudekerque Plant (France), Rotterdam Plant (Netherlands) and Nules Plant (Spain) are excluded from this analysis.
Simandou, Jadar, Rincon, La Granja, Winu and Resolution have been excluded from 2023 reporting as they are considered studies/projects.
